# NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.ErrorKey

**Structure**

Keys that identify errors that may occur during speech synthesis.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ErrorKey
```

## Discussion

Use these keys in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] dictionary.

## Type Properties

- **count**: The number of errors that have occurred in processing the current text string, since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
- **newestCharacterOffset**: The position in the text string of the most recent error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property. An `NSNumber`.
- **newestCode**: The error code of the most recent error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
- **oldestCharacterOffset**: The position in the text string of the first error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`
- **oldestCode**: The error code of the first error that occurred since the last call to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/SpeechPropertyKey/errors] property.  An `NSNumber`

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring Speech Attributes

- **addSpeechDictionary(_:)**: Registers the given speech dictionary with the receiver.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey**: These constants identify key-value pairs used to add vocabulary to the dictionary using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/addSpeechDictionary(_:)].
- **object(forProperty:)**: Provides the value of a receiver’s property.
- **setObject(_:forProperty:)**: Specifies the value of a receiver’s property.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey**: These constants are used with [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/setObject(_:forProperty:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/object(forProperty:)] to get or set the characteristics of a synthesizer.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.CommandDelimiterKey**: Keys for the command delimiters.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.Mode**: Keys for the speaking mode.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey**: Keys for the speech phoneme information.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.StatusKey**: Keys for the speech synthesizier status.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.SynthesizerInfoKey**: Keys for the speech synthesizier information.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceGender**: The following constants define voice gender attributes, which are the allowable values of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/VoiceAttributeKey/gender] key returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/attributes(forVoice:)].

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
